name: Sister’s Hair Designer
description:
Sister’s Hair Designer is a fantastic beauty hair design game.
Everyone knows that Abao hairstyling talents are unique! So Skipper, Stacey and Chelsea are very lucky to have a pro hairdresser as a sister, aren’t they? They have a unique opportunity to get new fashionable hairstyles almost every morning when Abao not too busy,and they use this opportunity as often as they can! Today Abao is taking her sisters to a picnic party and each of them required a special party hair. How could Abao refuse? Will you help Abao style up her little sisters? Do your best combing, cutting, dyeing and curling their hair and try to achieve exactly the look that each girl wants. Have fun!

Game Features:
- What kind of hairstyle Abao will make for her sisters?You can help her
- Learn the simple basic hair dyeing steps
- Well-designed game steps make you never want to stop
- Fluent and clearly frames,vivid and beautiful characters
- Comfortable color matching make you better enjoy this game
